Project Nature: "(T26) This is a CSA position responsible for acting as the Programme Office for service delivery of Government Electronic Trading Services (GETS) in monitoring the performance of GETS service providers (SPs) and be the central coordination across various GETS projects and liaise with other B/Ds on matters relating to GETS."
